archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: IF-00001 Staff details in WAMS
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: Spreadsheets of staff details are downloaded from SAP HR then loaded manually into WAMS 2 times a year. Note some WAMS users can add/change staff details directly in WAMS between times to keep WAMS up to date. 210218:Marked retired as assume replaced by IF-00430 (i.e. been replaced with a BO report as part of HR online - see Jenny's document. Probably Midland created the custom report for them)
